original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 329.40/60 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 329.40/60 to the US dollar on Tuesday, from 329.15/30 the day before, dealers said.
The Colombo Stock Exchange was trading down in the first hour of trading. The All Share Price Index was down 0.25 percent at 10,454.
The S&P SL20 was down 0.24 percent at 2,963. Turnover was at 81 million.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.25/50 percent from 14.35/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 14.45/60 percent from 14.40/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.65/75 percent from 14.55/70 percent. (Colombo/Nov27/2023)
